lyrics:
4 contributorsgood woman down lyricsproduced by 9th wonder

intro
in my life ive seen it all
and now its time
for me to pass on this knowledge to you
all my sisters
my troubled sisters
this is my gift to you

verse 1
been many days couldnt take the pain
felt i should take my life away
see it every day in every other young sisters fate
young sister sister
see im cryin now mind full of doubt
runnin in the streets no selfesteem
thinkin that used to be me
what a shame

prechorus
damn life is a mutha its hard to sit back
and see the same thing that happened to me happen to you
this aint love but heres the love i wanna give to you

chorus
it doesnt matter what they say or do do
dont let it get to you you
dont be afraid you can you can you can break through
take what i been through through
to see that
you cant hold a good woman down down
went through the same point of giving up up up
felt like i had enough nough
went to the edge of the ledge but i didnt jump
my life will sum it up up
you cant hold a good woman down
you might also likeverse 2
ooh when i used to see my daddy beat
my mother down down to her feet
i used to say that aint gon never be me never be me
now look at you bruised up from him
girl recognize youre better than
him telling you that hell never hit you again
girl dont cry

prechorus
damn life is a mutha its hard to sit back
and see the same thing that happened to me happen to you
this aint love but heres the love i wanna give to you

chorus
it doesnt matter what they say or do do
dont let it get to you you
dont be afraid you can you can you can break through
take what i been through through
to see that
you cant hold a good woman down down
went through the same point of giving up up up
felt like i had enough nough
went to the edge of the ledge but i didnt jump
my life will sum it up up
you cant hold a good woman down
bridge
through your changes i will hold your hand
use my songs as remedy
whenever youre feeling down and blue
ill be there for you
trust and know that ive been where youre at
seen the things that you cant see
looking at you resembles me
but you gotta hold on

chorus
it doesnt matter what they say or do do
ooh girl dont cry
dont let it get to you you
dont be afraid you can you can you can break through
take what i been through through
to see that
you cant hold a good woman down down
you cant hold a good woman down
went through the same point of giving up up up
felt like i had enough nough
went to the edge of the ledge but i didnt jump
went to the edge of the ledge but i didnt jump
my life will sum it up up
you cant hold a good woman down
postchorus
you cant hold me you cant hold me down you cant hold me
you cant hold me down you cant hold me
you cant hold a good woman down oh oh
you cant hold me down cant hold me down no no no

outro
there you have it
im still with you my sisters
my troubled sisters
i still have troubles too
you cant hold a good woman down
youre not alone
ill always be there for you
rock on
you cant hold a good woman downembed
